categories: Category:Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition

nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition

Star Wars: A New Hope - The Special Edition was a four-issue series of comic adapting the Special Edition release of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and was published by Dark Horse in 1997 to coincide with the film's rerelease. The four covers make up a collage of characters and settings from A New Hope.
